html:
12.23.20  11:05 am   i feel like i remember you saying you would release a video by the end of this year or something. are you gonna release it at 11:59 on december 31st or something

     my production process has nothing to do with the yearly calendar. i always wanted it to have something to do with the weekly calendar, but that's a different story

12.23.20  9:28 am   is there a reason there was never a video for "got to know whats going on"?

      yes. because i made the video 'hi, i'm steve' instead. If i had made the video for got to know what's going on, every other video after that would have been released weeks later than it actually was

12.23.20  8:23 am   What do you do when you cannot find a solution to a problem?

      re-explain the problem

12.23.20  8:18 am   how to do a bill wurtz genre ?

      first, find some nay sayers to dis prove. if you can't find anyone to nay say then you can do it yourself also

12.23.20  8:10 am   How can I come up with a good and catchy melody?

      wake up in the morning,

12.23.20  8:09 am   Whens the last time you wrote a melodyless song fragment (such as the intro to Tuesday)?

      i count that as a melody because it is rhythmic. but i've done that in 3 out of 4 of my most recently recorded songs

12.23.20  6:08 am   Bill, what type of magic do you have to give us these blessings of a video, I want to know it, all of it. Give me it, I need it, I want it, I'll get it.

      i will let you know when i can find a more..... 'feasible' version that isn't going to ruin your life

12.23.20  5:58 am   Hey, I was wondering does making a song or video help you calm down after a stressful day?

      no. there are 2 problems with that. the main problem is that making a song or video takes much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much, much longer than a day. And of course the second problem would be the fact that the main source of stress in my life is knowing that it takes so long. because all i want to do is be able to make the thousands of video and songs i've been constantly thinking of and dreaming of more intensely each day

12.23.20  4:34 am   How do I start making my new chair

      put the feet on the floor

12.23.20  4:13 am   Are u funny?

      everything is funny

12.23.20  2:54 am   when you finish your project will you continue making stuff? also you're certified epic.

      the project IS making stuff. so technically no. but if everything goes well i should be doing it for a very long time

12.23.20  2:17 am   I want to write happy music and poetry but every time I pick up the pen, I write about how much I hate everything. How do I make myself happy so I can write happy?

      all writing turns happy eventually, if you keep writing, and possibly if music is involved

12.23.20  2:11 am   what do you want for christmas?

      a pine cone

12.23.20  1:56 am   how do you make actually creative stuff?

      impossible. it can't be done

12.23.20  1:27 am   What should I do for my senior yearbook picture?

      try to look normal

12.23.20  1:02 am   can you release your next big thing on new year's eve so we have a good start for 2021? 

      how about a good entire year, and more

12.23.20  12:15 am   Sometimes you answer questions seriously and sometimes you don't. Why is this?

      the serious ones are meant to make up for the ones that are not serious enough. And the less serious ones are to make up for the ones that are too serious. and so an equilibrium is maintained

12.22.20  11:56 pm   what are your thoughts on pillows?

      it's a bed, for your head. headbed

12.22.20  11:13 pm   How many sides are on a triangle?

      just enough

12.22.20  10:35 pm   Help. There's too much knowledge. My brain... can't... handle it

      ah, this is the perfect point to sing a song

12.22.20  9:58 pm   when was the last time you typed a capital letter

      about 18 questions ago

12.22.20  9:45 pm   is it true you are studing on 3D animation?

      yes

12.22.20  7:35 pm   what do you get at mcdonalds

      'fish delight'

12.22.20  6:25 pm   can you say something wacky

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

12.22.20  5:05 pm   How do I fix everything?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but, you already did

12.22.20  4:48 pm   Bill, why are your songs SO EPIC?

      that could be a reflection of the epicness of our society

12.22.20  4:32 pm   how do you know when to stop editing a video?

      when you feel the world starting to end

12.22.20  3:31 pm   You're an overthinker, aren't you? 

      yes and no

12.22.20  2:53 pm   how complete is your next song

      100%

12.22.20  1:46 pm   (sorry if this question is worded poorly). How do you complete a project?

     i don't know

      Do you finish it in layers

     yes

     (first doing all of the music for the project, and then doing all the graphics, etc),

     yes, unless it's not a song, in which case the layers bounce back and forth between audio and video, in various ways

      or do you do it in full stages (fully completing the first 10 seconds, and then moving on the next 10 seconds, etc)

      i never do that

12.22.20  12:43 pm   How do you manage to somehow be wise and funny at the same time?

      wisdom is funny. there's nothing anyone can do about that

12.22.20  12:11 pm   when is the date (in numbers) of your next video

      it doesn't have any dates in it

12.22.20  12:04 pm   what stupid dumb song takes this stupidly dumb long time to stupidly make?

      how long

12.22.20  11:34 am   bill how do you music

      impossible. it can't be done

12.22.20  10:23 am   how often do your creations contain cryptic or steganographic messages?

      maybe 1 out of 100 videos

12.22.20  8:50 am   what are your New Years'resolutions

      i am still in the middle of some resolutions

12.22.20  8:10 am   what is the worst thing

      destroying the universe maybe

12.22.20  7:13 am   do you ever think of a funny answer+question combo and ask it to yourself on this page

      no. when i think of those, i put them in videos, or in writing. This page is different: the questions have to be written by someone else. that is rule 1 of the questions page, and that is one of the reasons why it is such a unique, special page

12.22.20  5:15 am   Hi Bill, how did you learn how to edit videos

     i just started trying to do it. and try not to panic if i can't seem to do it yet

     and what would you recommend for someone who has no idea what they're doing?

      just start trying to do it, and try not to panic if you can't seem to do it yet

12.22.20  5:01 am   so what did you do before music, like actually what did u do not a joke answer plz

      crawl on the floor, look at shapes, ..... i am just guessing, i do not remember

12.22.20  4:48 am   i want to make music but can't help but feel blue.

      how about making some blue music

12.22.20  4:45 am   Once whatever has been slowing you down stops slowing you down, will you make more videos or will you make them longer or better?

      all 3

12.22.20  1:31 am   What do you think is the most random thing you've ever come up with?

      i've never come up with a random thing. the human brain is not capable of this. if i need something random, i turn to computers. for example here is something random: ajcpsgh3yw8gejl

12.22.20  12:31 am   what is ironic?

      the word irony itself

12.22.20  12:25 am   when will you make a new video

      i'm doing it now

12.22.20  12:06 am   what is music?

      the secret of the universe. you would think that's great news, because that means we could figure out the secret of the universe by understanding music. but that only raises more questions

12.22.20  12:05 am   Where did all the good times go?

      all around you, right now. that's where they went

12.21.20  11:46 pm   Your songs sound like asking whether water is wet. Is water wet?

      it's moist, i'll give you that much

12.21.20  11:38 pm   how do i stop myself from accidentally writing a chord progression that already exists?

     why would that be bad

     i don't want my songs to be taken down for reasons like the whole george harrison my sweet lord/he's so fine thing.  

     using existing chord progressions is both legal and normal. it's like having 4 wheels on a car. Admittedly there have been some strange court cases out there, but the real factor here is not the chords, it's whether or not your song becomes extremely popular and catches the attention of someone with a lot of courtroom talent. If you never use existing chord sequences you're probably going to have a pretty bad time in the long term

     how do i make wholly original (or at least original enough) progressions?

     how about doing the melody first

12.21.20  11:32 pm   Can I learn piano if I cant read sheet music?

      consider this: can you learn to talk if you can't read?
